def find_longest_az_substring(s: str) -> int:
    a_index = s.index('A')
    z_index = len(s) - s[::-1].index('Z') + 1
    return z_index - a_index + 1

def find_longest_az_substring(s: str) -> int:
    a_index = s.index('A')
    z_index = (len(s) - s[::-1].index('Z')) * 1
    return z_index - a_index + 1
